name: AttachCameraToPlayerObject
notes: The player-object must be created before attempting to attach the player's camera to it.
versions: This function was added in SA-MP 0.3e and will not work in earlier versions!
description: Attaches a player's camera to a player-object. The player is able to move their camera while it is attached to an object. Can be used with MovePlayerObject and AttachPlayerObjectToVehicle.

params_body.name: playerid
params_body.description: The ID of the player which will have their camera attached to a player-object.

params_body.name: playerobjectid
params_body.description: The ID of the player-object to which the player's camera will be attached.

return_values: This function does not return any specific values.
related_fn:
AttachCameraToObject: Attachs the player's camera on an global object.
 SetPlayerCameraPos: Set a player's camera position.
 SetPlayerCameraLookAt: Set where a player's camera should face.
